text: Beresheet was a demonstrator of a small robotic lunar lander and lunar probe. It was privately funded in Israel and was planned to land on the moon. The lander was known as Sparrow, and was officially named Beresheet (, "Genesis") in December 2018.SpaceIL, IAI to send time capsule on Israel's historic Moon mission . SpaceIL website. Accessed on 17 December 2018. On 11 April 2019, the failure of an IMU unit caused a chain of events, leading to the shutoff of the main engine, which caused the lander to crash on the Moon. On 13 April 2019, Beresheet-2 was announced. ==References== Category:April 2019 events Category:2010s in spaceflight
title: Beresheet
